title: Health Monitoring Dashboard Customization
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a customizable health metrics dashboard that allows me to track real-time health data for my clients so that I can efficiently monitor their well-being while ensuring their privacy and clarity in communication.

title: Health Monitoring and Alert Management
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to verify health monitoring results and mediate alerts so that I can ensure accurate interpretation of health data and make informed decisions without causing unnecessary stress for my clients.

title: Customizable Caregiver Alert Thresholds
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to customize alert thresholds for health monitoring so that I can receive timely notifications without alarming my clients or making rushed decisions based on misinterpreted data.

title: Tailored Medication Reminders
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to provide tailored medication reminders that are context-sensitive and can be validated before notifying clients, so that I can ensure my clients receive timely and appropriate reminders without causing unnecessary stress or confusion.

title: Remote Patient Check-in Interface – Scheduled Virtual Check-ins via Video
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to conduct scheduled virtual check-ins via video so that I can monitor my clients' health in real-time, maintain clear communication with their families, and provide personalized care without overwhelming my clients with impersonal alerts.

title: Emergency Response Coordination – Caregiver Alerts for Client Emergencies
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive timely alerts for client emergencies so that I can intervene swiftly and ensure their safety while minimizing unnecessary stress on my clients.

title: Holistic Health Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to track multiple clients' health metrics in real-time and receive alerts for any anomalies, so that I can ensure their safety and well-being without compromising their privacy.
